songs.title: Demo Song 1

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: Walking down the street in Philadelphia
Thinking about the music we could make
Four friends with a dream to share
Every note we play is ours to take

lyrics.label: Chorus
lines: We are giants, giants of all sizes
Making noise that reaches to the sky
From the basement to the stages
We'll keep playing till we die

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: Tommy on the drums, keeping time so tight
Jakob's guitar screaming through the night
Dylan's bass line holding down the groove
Calvin's voice making everybody move

songs.story: This was the first song we wrote together as a band. It captures our energy and commitment to making music on our own terms.

songs.title: Underground Dreams

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: In the underground, where the music's loud
We found our sound in the restless crowd
No rules to follow, no path to take
Just the noise we're born to make

lyrics.label: Bridge
lines: Turn it up, turn it loud
We're not backing down
This is our time now

songs.story: Written after our first show at Underground Arts. The energy of that night inspired this track.

songs.title: Montgomery County Blues

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: Suburban streets and shopping malls
But we've got rock and roll
Montgomery County can't hold us back
We're taking control

songs.story: A love letter to our hometown, acknowledging where we come from while looking forward to where we're going.
